# Description

I am a PhD student at Erasmus MC investigating how brain structure and connectivity relate with behavioural and emotional problems in children and adolescents from the general population. I am also the co-funder of Rotterdam [R.I.O.T. Science Club](https://rdam-riot-science-club.github.io/), a community providing training in **R**eproducible, **I**nterpretable, **O**pen, and **T**ransparent science.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Lorenza Dall'Aglio"
special_skill <- c("academic tweeting", "R")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", all_of(special_skill), "preregistration", "data sharing", "open source software", "open access", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
